contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2013}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:NedsPointfrontgate.JPG|thumb|Neds Point front gate]] '''Neds Point Fort''' is one of several [[Napoleonic]] batteries built along the shores of [[Lough Swilly]] in [[county Donegal]], to defend the north west of [[Ireland]]. It is situated near the once important naval town of [[Buncrana]]. It was remodeled in 1897 as a twin 6" battery. The site is currently under restoration and will be open to the public as a digital wildlife observation centre in spring of 2013 {{Coord missing|County Donegal}} [[Category:Forts in Ireland]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in County Donegal]] {{Ireland-struct-stub}}
